reviews.name: Maglite LED Solitaire Flashlight
reviews.reviewText: I liked this product before I bought it, because it does not has a bulge in the head, it is the smallest 1 AAA LED flashlight in the market as it's halogen predecessor. but has 37 lumens instead of 2, that is 18 times brighter, so bright that I use it as a regular flashlight instead of a key chain flashlight like the intention of the manufacturer
reviews.title: best appearance

reviews.name: Maglite LED Solitaire Flashlight
reviews.reviewText: It's a great light and uses only one AAA battery.
reviews.title: I like it!

reviews.name: Maglite LED Solitaire Flashlight
reviews.reviewText: I just picked up my 2nd & 3rd lights after an impressive performance of my 1st Solitaire. Each vehicle keyring in our home now has dependable light available at night.
reviews.title: Rugged & very bright!

reviews.name: Maglite LED Solitaire Flashlight
reviews.reviewText: The LED Solitaire replaced my Streamlight Microstream because it's brighter, smaller, focusable, less expensive and I prefer the twisty switch to the hard-to-press tail switch. I use this light so much at work that I keep it attached to the neck lanyard that came with the Streamlight. I have over 20 LED flashlights, for different purposes, and always carry at least three, but I actually use the Solitaire the most. By the way, this is my only Maglite product for now.
reviews.title: Great Value, Very Useful

reviews.name: Maglite LED Solitaire Flashlight
reviews.reviewText:
American made Maglite LED flashlight.
Operates on 1 ea. aaa battery, is small enough to pocket carry and costs less than 12 bucks.

Enough said.........buy several!
reviews.title: Powerful, efficient mini flashlight.
